intent: Produce a comprehensive research report on microservices architecture

success_criteria.primary: Reader learns what microservices are, why they matter, and current best practices
success_criteria.secondary: Report is well-organized and cites specific technologies/patterns

must_cover: Benefits: independent deployment, scaling, technology diversity
Challenges: distributed systems complexity, data consistency, operational overhead
Common patterns: API gateway, service mesh, event-driven communication
must_avoid: Outdated practices (e.g., SOAP as primary recommendation)

quality_rubric.accuracy: Technical claims should be factually correct (e.g., service mesh does X, not Y)
quality_rubric.depth: Goes beyond Wikipedia-level overview; includes practical considerations
quality_rubric.balance: Presents both benefits and challenges honestly
quality_rubric.actionability: Reader could use this to inform an architecture decision
quality_rubric.currency: References modern practices (2020+), not legacy approaches
